long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension which stores links that you regularly need to open, and gives you the option to open them all as new tabs with one-click. The primary use case is saving all of your bill-pay sites to the extension, and then monthly when you are ready to pay the bills, using the extension to quickly open the tabs. This helps keep track of what bills you need to pay, as well as speeds up the time to open each website.
